evidence.text: IT IS ORDERED that Defendants’ Motion to Transfer to the United States Court of International Trade (Doc. 18) is GRANTED. This case shall be transferred to the United States Court of International Trade pursuant to 28 U.S.C. § 1631.

extracted.value: The court granted Defendants' Motion to Transfer jurisdiction to the United States Court of International Trade (Doc. 18) on April 25, 2025, finding the case falls under the Court of International Trade's exclusive jurisdiction under 28 U.S.C. § 1581(i).

evidence.text: IT IS FURTHER ORDERED that Defendants’ Motion to Stay (Doc. 20) pending resolution of the Motion to Transfer is DENIED AS MOOT.

extracted.value: The court denied Defendants' Motion to Stay proceedings pending resolution of the Motion to Transfer (Doc. 20) as moot on April 25, 2025.

evidence.text: IT IS ORDERED that Plaintiffs’ motion for preliminary injunction pending appeal (Doc. 42) is DENIED.

extracted.value: The court denied Plaintiffs' motion for preliminary injunction pending appeal (Doc. 42) on April 28, 2025.
